title: Reclaimed
description: **COMPLETE SERIES**What happens when your past catches up to you?We found the Salvaged Lands and were welcomed into this secret sanctuary. Inside we find survivors, some comforts, and people who bring us more questions than answers.With this new adventure, comes a new threat. We can no longer trust some of the new friends we've made.The list of strange things going on is growing longer. My guys are developing more powers, and now I’m becoming afraid to touch them, in fear I may inadvertently turn them into rotters instead.I don’t know the full potential of what I can do. I don’t know if I’m technically even human.But what I do know, is:1) There are more dangers in this world than I originally thought, and2) If you don’t fight, you die.
author: Maya Riley
